mapper.select: SELECT p.name as postName,p.work_city as workCity,ra.approval_time as approvalTime,e.name as enterpriseName FROM resume_approval ra JOIN submit s ON ra.submit_id = s.id JOIN post p ON s.post_id=p.id JOIN human_resource hs ON p.hr_id=hs.id JOIN enterprise e ON hs.firm_id=e.id WHERE s.stu_id = #{studentId} AND ra.approval_stage=#{resumeApproval}
